scripts.dev:web: concurrently --kill-others --names server,client "bun run --filter server dev" "bun run --filter client dev"
scripts.build:apps: bun run --filter client build && bun run --filter server compile
scripts.ios:install: xcrun devicectl device install app --device A0B78F24-E37A-5781-A622-4C1933760D99 tauri/gen/apple/build/arm64/church-hub.ipa
scripts.ios:launch: xcrun devicectl device process launch --device A0B78F24-E37A-5781-A622-4C1933760D99 com.church-hub
scripts.ios:run: pnpm ios:build && pnpm ios:install && pnpm ios:launch
scripts.ios:run:release: pnpm ios:build:release && pnpm ios:install && pnpm ios:launch
scripts.setup:libmpv: npx tauri-plugin-libmpv-api setup-lib && mkdir -p tauri/lib && cp -r src-tauri/lib/* tauri/lib/ 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf src-tauri
